titles.title: Protecting America’s Agricultural Land from Foreign Harm Act of 2025
Protecting America’s Agricultural Land from Foreign Harm Act of 2025
To prohibit the purchase or lease of agricultural land in the United States by persons associated with certain foreign governments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
